meanings.definition: A person who invents something jointly with another person.
meanings.sent1: The coinventor of the new gadget was thrilled to see it succeed.
meanings.sent2: The two friends became coinventors of a revolutionary device.
meanings.sent3: The coinventor and his partner celebrated their invention with a high-five.
meanings.sent4: Being a coinventor is like being a detective, solving problems together.
meanings.sent5: The young coinventor had big dreams of changing the world with their creations.

meanings.definition: To invent something jointly with another person.
meanings.sent1: They decided to coinventor a solution to the problem at hand.
meanings.sent2: The siblings coinventored a game that became an instant hit.
meanings.sent3: Let's coinventor a way to make chores more fun!
meanings.sent4: Their ability to coinventor ideas quickly made them a dynamic duo.
meanings.sent5: The team's goal was to coinventor a product that would make life easier for everyone.
